original: intros h st out st' l H. pose proof handleTimeout_matchIndex_preserved as H0. apply H0 in H as H1. unfold matchIndex_preserved in H1. destruct (handleTimeout_type h st out st' l H) as [[Ht Hc] | Hc]. - destruct (handleTimeout_log_same h st out st' l H) as Hlog. specialize (H1 eq_refl). tauto. - destruct Hc as [Ht Hc]. specialize (H1 Ht). unfold matchIndex. tauto.
